# List of best-selling albums by year in the United Kingdom

went on to earn the most best-selling albums of the year, five times with With the Beatles (1963), Beatles for Sale (1964), ''Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band (1967), Abbey Road (1969) and 1 (2000).|265x265px]]
had the best-selling album four times, the most for a female artist with 21 (2011), 25 (2015, 2016) and 30 (2021).]]
had the best-selling album of the year three times with Greatest Hits (1976), Arrival (1977) and Super Trouper (1980).]]
had the best-selling album of 1986 with True Blue.]]
had the best-selling album of 1988 with her debut album Kylie.]]
has earned the best-selling album of the year twice with X (2014) and ÷ (2017).]]
had the best-selling album of 2024 with The Tortured Poets Department.]]
This is a list of the best-selling albums in the United Kingdom each year. The sales figures given are only within that year, but each album has sold more copies overall.
